statements: UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_details = '{"likes": 5, "comments": 10}' WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE player_id = 456 AND interaction_timestamp = '2022-02-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'purchase', interaction_timestamp = '2022-09-30 12:30:00' WHERE player_id = 1234;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_details = '{"item": "sword", "quantity": 1}' WHERE player_id = 5678;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'login', interaction_time = NOW() WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_details = 'New details for interaction' WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'like';
UPDATE GameRecords SET game_result = 'Win', score = 100 WHERE player_id = 456 AND game_id = 789;
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_details = 'Updated details' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE GameRecords SET score = 1000, game_result = 'Win' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_data SET level = 10, experience = experience + 1000 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_preferences SET sound_effects_enabled = true, music_enabled = false WHERE player_id = '87654321-789e-3d21-b986-751217614426';
UPDATE player_data SET level = level + 1, gold = gold - 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE purchase_history SET item_price = item_price * 1.1, item_category = 'Super Rare' WHERE purchase_id = '333e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_data SET level = 10, score = 1500 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_scores SET score_date = '2022-09-30', score_value = 2000 WHERE player_id = 456 AND level_id = 3;
UPDATE player_data SET score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_sessions SET session_duration = 1200, end_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE session_id = 5;
